svg.content: <mxfile><diagram name="AWS Infrastructure" id="aws-prod-infra"><mxGraphModel dx="1422" dy="794" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1"
